text: Accepted Manuscript Resolution of the cloud enhancement problem for one-minute diffuse radiation prediction Allan R. Starke, Leonardo F.L. Lemos, John Boland, José M. Cardemil, Sergio Colle PII: S0960-1481(18)30259-3 DOI: 10.1016/j.renene.2018.02.107 Reference: RENE 9838 To appear in: Renewable Energy Received Date: 11 August 2017 Revised Date: 20 February 2018 Accepted Date: 22 February 2018 Please cite this article as: Starke AR, Lemos LFL, Boland J, Cardemil JoséM, Colle S, Resolution of the cloud enhancement problem for one-minute diffuse radiation prediction, Renewable Energy (2018), doi: 10.1016/j.renene.2018.02.107. This is a PDF file of an unedited manuscript that has been accepted for publication. As a service to our customers we are providing this early version of the manuscript. The manuscript will undergo copyediting, typesetting, and review of the resulting proof before it is published in its final form. Please note that during the production process errors may be discovered which could affect the content, and all legal disclaimers that apply to the journal pertain.
